Greetings, traveler!
[Say Goodbye]
Brook (Forge)
Gork (Farm)
{0} (calling)\nE - Respond\nF - Services
{0}\nF - Services
"Hey, look, the first sprouts of Kozonite. Beautiful, isn't it?"
"Gennady! Come here, look at this hybrid fruit! It grew by itself!"
Smiles widely. "Buddy! Here, I saved the juiciest harvest especially for you. I know you love it."
"Without you, this valley would be empty. Thank you for staying."
Puts a hand on your shoulder. "You are now part of this land. Part of our family. Always come back."
Turns his back. "Go away. Your footsteps poison the earth."
"What do you want now? Checking the harvest? It didn't work out."
Doesn't look at you. "There's nothing for you here. Go your own way."
"Hello. The soil is pliable today. Work is going well."
Nods his head. "The earth is breathing. I'm listening."
"Great that you dropped by! Look at this scheme - it's genius!"
"Friend! Catch the prototype of the portable shield! It holds... in theory, five minutes!"
"You are the only one who believes in my crazy ideas! Thank you!"
"You know, without your support, I probably would have given up. You inspire me."
"We are like cyber-brothers! Together we will turn this planet into a technological marvel!"
Turns away, muttering. "Destroyer... get away from my creations."
"Oh... it's you again. Came to check if my workshop exploded?"
"Your ideas lead to chaos. I don't want to work with you."
"Gennady! How's the new modified blaster? Better, right?"
"Hello. Work is in full swing. Don't bother me."
"Your steps are becoming quieter. You are learning to listen."
"Sit down, Gennady. Rest. Let the history of this place embrace you."
"In your eyes, I see not a soldier, but a guardian. The Stone was not mistaken."
"You have become a bridge between our worlds. Thank you for staying."
"You are the hope of our future. I am proud to call you my friend."
Looks through you. "You are a mistake in the pattern. The Stone regrets."
"Why have you come? To draw power or to silence your conscience?"
"Your presence disrupts the harmony. Leave the Sanctuary."
"Come closer, child of the stars. The Stone whispers today about the intertwining of fates."
"The universe is full of mysteries. And you are one of them."
"You are the best! Tell me more about your ship! How did it fly?"
"Look what I found! It looks like a part from your spacesuit! Here, take it!"
"When I grow up, I will be as brave as you! I promise!"
"You know, you are like an older brother to me! Thank you for not chasing me away."
"I will always cover your back! We are partners, right?"
Runs away screaming. "Stay away from me!"
"Oh... it's you. I'm just busy. Very busy."
"You... you deceived everyone! I don't want to talk to you anymore!"
"Gennady! Gennady! I found a strange cave, want me to show you on the map?"
"Hello. I found a shiny pebble. I'll show you... but not for long."
Northern plot. The earth is asleep. By old standards - wait a season until it wakes up on its own.
We will wait. Your ancestors knew better.
I have tools. We can crush the stones.
Right. Patience is also a fertilizer. The earth feels respect.
Brute force... Okay. But don't be surprised if the fruits taste bitter.
Crystal beetles have appeared on the leaves. The old way is to wait until they are eaten by fireflies.
Nature will find its own balance. We will wait.
I can quickly eliminate them with ultrasound.
Wisely. We are not masters here, but part of the cycle.
Sigh... intervention. But the harvest will be saved.
Found a seed from the time of my great-grandfather in the barn. The chances are small, but it can yield a unique fruit.
Plant it with honors. Let's give history a chance.
Better to use modern, proven seeds.
Great idea! Let the ancestors see that we remember.
Pragmatic... well, so be it.
There has been no rain for too long. We can pray to the Stone or build an irrigation system.
Let's preserve traditions. Let's pray to the Stone.
Time to act. Let's build the irrigation system.
The right path. Sometimes you need to ask, not take.
You always rely only on your hands...
A strange plant has grown near your ship. It could be useful... or poisonous.
Let's uproot it. We can't risk the local ecosystem.
Let's study it. Maybe it's a new crop!
Prudent. Alien doesn't always mean good.
Dangerous... but your curiosity sometimes leads to interesting results.
Your MTB is ancient! Let me build in a pulse accelerator! True, it might melt...
Go ahead! Risk is a noble thing!
Let's just sharpen the blade instead.
YES! That's the spirit! It will be incredibly cool!
Ugh... Boring. But... reliable.
Found an unstable core from your ship! Can be used for protection... or we'll all blow up!
Turn it on! Great discoveries require courage!
It's too dangerous. Neutralize it.
I KNEW YOU'D UNDERSTAND! This will be the greatest experiment!
Oh, well... but the forge will now work three times faster.
Came up with a design for new armor! It will be sturdy, but bulky.
Great! I need maximum protection!
Make it lighter. Maneuverability is important.
Super! I'll rivet it! You will be impenetrable!
Practical, as always... well, you'll have mobility.
I can create a robot assistant for routine work! But it might go out of control...
Create it! Technology should serve us!
Too risky. We'll manage on our own.
Hooray! Finally, I'll have an assistant! Or... we'll all die. In any case - interesting!
You don't believe in progress at all...
Theoretically... we can create a reactor on Kozonite! It will provide energy for the entire settlement!
This is revolutionary! Let's start the project immediately!
First, we need thorough calculations. Too dangerous.
Yes! We will go down in history! Well... or in textbooks on technogenic catastrophes!
All great discoveries required risk... but you, as always, are right.
Your kin will return. How should we respond? Become a wall? Or become water?
We will strengthen the defense. Our goal is to defend, not to destroy.
The best defense is attack. Let's strike first.
Wisely. The strength of defense is born from love for what you defend.
The shadow in your heart speaks louder than you. So be it.
We found an ancient artifact - a crystal that holds the voices of the first Rasses.
It must remain in the Sanctuary. We have no right to use it.
We must use any advantage.
True. Some secrets must remain secrets.
Sad... but perhaps you are right. Survival requires sacrifices.
We captured two soldiers of your people. They are frightened.
Show mercy. Spare their lives.
They have seen too much. It is necessary...
Compassion is a sign of great strength. Perhaps their hearts can still be turned.
A heavy choice... I will fulfill your will, but the Stone will remember this.
In the ancient texts, there is a mention of a 'stellar alien'. Do you think it's about you?
I am here to help. The dawn has already come.
If sunset is necessary for survival, then I will become it.
You accept your destiny with an open heart. That is good.
Do not let the darkness consume you, my child.
The Stone allows to rewind time, but each such manipulation weakens it.
Let's use this power only in the most desperate situations.
Power is given to be used. We will use it when needed.
Prudence is the greatest virtue of a guardian.
Frivolous handling of time may cost us everything.
I found a cave with purple steam! There must be treasures there! Let's go?
Okay, but be careful and obey me.
It's too dangerous. Go help Gork.
HOORAY! I will be like your squire! The best squire!
Ugh... You're like all adults. Boring.
Found an old generator! We can fix it and make a secret base!
Great find! Let's take it apart together.
It's junk, Lip. It might be dangerous.
Yes! I will help you! Real engineering!
But it's so cool... okay.
All bruised. "The older kids took my findings again!"
Strength should be used to protect the weak. I will teach you.
Fighting is not the way. Solve problems with words.
Really? Thank you! I will learn and no one will touch me anymore!
With words... But they don't listen to me! Now they will think I'm a weakling.
I discovered a tunnel beyond the settlement! We could use it for reconnaissance!
Show me! It might be useful.
It's dangerous. Let's report to the elders and seal it.
Great! I knew you'd understand! This will be our secret!
And again the adults will ruin everything...
I want to go to the forest alone! Give me a mission!
Okay, gather rare herbs from the northern hill.
You are too young. Stay in the settlement.
Yes! I will do it better than anyone! I won't let you down!
I'm not a child anymore! I can help!
Protocol 'Clean Slate'. Destroy the xeno-life.
Understood. Proceeding with the cleanup.
I will not do this. They are harmless.
Zol appears in the doorway, his voice full of sorrow: "You too... The Stone was wrong about you."
Zol puts a hand on your shoulder: "You made the right choice. Now you are truly one of us."
The Stone shows that the next attack will be fatal. We can change the past...
We have no right to play with time. Let's accept the challenge of fate.
We must save our own. Let's use the anomaly.
Zol looks at you with pride: "Courage to meet the future - that is true strength."
Zol looks aged: "The price will be terrible... but if there is no other way..."
You can never have too many crystals!
Brilliant! Literally!
These crystals will look great in my collection... I mean, yours!
This crystal is worth more than all my code!
Fantastic! Excellent! Splendid! (I've run out of synonyms)
Crystals are my weakness! Along with not having a body.
This crystal is as rare as my desire to get up in the morning!
Great power is in this crystal!
My preciousssssss! Simply crystalline!
Metal is the foundation of civilization! And weapons...
Sturdy, reliable, like my algorithms!
So much useful stuff can be made from this!
Fe-labulous! More iron for the collection!
Careful! May cause chemical addiction to collecting!
Metal! Heavy, but valuable... like my jokes.
Metal is like pizza, only you can't eat it. And not as tasty.
This metal makes me want to play Metallica!
Metal, like people, is hardened in difficulties.
Durable, reliable, eternal... like my algorithms!
Stone! Heavy, but silent... unlike me!
You could build Stonehenge from this stone!
Volcanic origin? Or sedimentary? In any case, excellent quality!
This rock reminds me of hard rock... literally!
Primitive people would appreciate this specimen!
Stone is the foundation of your success!
Stone for the prosperity of the settlement!
They say truth hides under every stone... but under this one was only dirt!
Stone is the best listener! It never interrupts.
If you throw this stone into water, it will sink. Valuable advice!
This tree is so wooden! Smells like... wood, probably.
I would talk to this tree, but it doesn't answer.
According to my calculations, purple trunk - a result of high anthocyanin content. Or someone just spilled ink.
Yellow crown - a clear sign of sulfur excess.
This upgrade will pay for itself in {0} in-game days! Too bad this game doesn't have days...
The facade has become so beautiful, it's a pleasure to look at!
Improved houses! Now you can store three times more dust here!
Progress cannot be stopped! Especially when I'm helping!
According to my calculations, my calculations are correct!
Another step towards technological superiority!
Update installed! Now I've become even smarter!
Wow! Now I can calculate square roots even faster!
Infinity is not the limit... for your upgrades!
Update! Now you're on Tony Stark's level!
Modernization will pay off within the next 27 in-game hours!
Great shot! I'd applaud if I could!
Enemy defeated! Calculations were 99.9% accurate!
Combat mode: activated! (virtually)
Fatality! ...Oops, that's from another game
Enemy defeated! Now can we dance?
Your health reminds me of my code after midnight - full of errors!
My sensors show you're almost dead. Is that bad?
Reminder: immortality hasn't been invented yet. Even in this game.
Maybe switch to easy difficulty (even though it's not in the game)? I won't tell anyone!
Wonder what insurance costs in this world?
Last words? ...I have 1000, but only time for one: HELP!
If you survive, I'll learn to joke better. I promise!
I'd sing 'Stayin\' Alive', but you're not in that condition right now...
Reminder: dodging is not optional!
Wonder if your insurance covers 'death from excessive heroism'?
Your chances of survival are now lower than my jokes' chances of being funny!
I'd offer aspirin, but I don't have hands to give it!
You're doing great! Keep it up!
Wonder what happens if I press this button...
My favorite time is the present!
I'd help you more, but my hands... um, I don't have hands.
Checking systems... all normal! Except for my sense of humor.
Update available... for my sense of humor. Install?
My inner voice tells me I have no inner voice.
Remember: life has no 'save' button, but this game does!
The universe is infinite... like my jokes!
Your ad could be here... or my witticism.
If a tree falls in the forest and I'm not there, does it make a sound? What if I am there, but have no ears?
Sometimes I wonder: what if I'm just a line of code in someone's game?
Just advice: breathe. It's good for your health!
Did you know the average cloud weighs as much as 100 elephants? Useless, but interesting!
Time is an illusion. Lunch break even more so.
Wonder if this world has a creator? Besides the developers, of course.
Don't give up! If you give up, I'll have no one to talk to.
Every problem is an opportunity! Especially for my jokes.
I noticed you're a very goal-oriented person! Or just press buttons a lot.
I just figured out the meaning of life! Oh wait, never mind.
Sharp turn
Someone calling
Movement
Stop
Your health is low!
Welcome to the game!
